channel.title: How do i change a item bonuses?
channel.description: how do i change a items bonuses?!?!? plz help me

item.title: How do i change a item bonuses?
item.dc:creator: @revol_2 revol 2
item.description:
@revol_2 wrote:

Go in Item.CFG than ctrl+f and write up the item u want to add bonuses than there is number like 14.6844766903 and another one like that after this there is number (0 and more number) all the 0 or other number is the bonuse the item makes,

Like you want make a perfect ring,u choose a ring and the all the “0” you change it for 10000 it will give 10000 bonuse if u make other 0 to 10000 it will add to all bonus 10000

Understand what im saying?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change a item bonuses?
